description:
Azi Dahaka achieves his final evolution form and flies off in search of his nemesis, Balle Soleil. He encounters Chief of the Sea, Dai Kaido, who tries to protect Gao and Bal by challenging Kyoya and Azi Dahaka to a Buddyfight
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Endless! Black Sky Sun Dragon, Azi Dahaka "Daeva"!
Endless! Kuroten Taiyou Ryuu Azi Dahaka "Da Eva"!!
エンドレス! 黒天太陽竜アジ・ダハーカ"ダ・エーワ"!!
